species.name: shellos
descriptions: Beware of pushing strongly on its squishy body, as it makes a mysterious purple fluid ooze out.
For the most part, it makes its home along the seashore. Its color and form differ according to its habitat and the quality of its food.
Found in abundance on seashores bordering warm waters. Shellos are unexpectedly friendly and will crawl toward any person they see. Take care not to get coated in mucus!
It lives along bodies of water. Its body shape has changed to suit its habitat.
Its colors and shapes differ from region to region. In the Sinnoh region, two types are confirmed.

abilities.name: sticky-hold
abilities.effect: Prevents a held item from being removed by other Pokémon.

abilities.name: storm-drain
abilities.effect: Redirects single-target water moves to this Pokémon where possible.  Absorbs Water moves, raising Special Attack one stage.

abilities.name: sand-force
abilities.effect: Strengthens rock, ground, and steel moves to 1.3× their power during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.
